Over 18? Free in August?
Want to gain experience working with children who have disabilities? This is an exclusive opportunity for NCS Graduates who are over 18.
Sense are a national charity supporting people who are deafblind. They have an amazing new opportunity to get involved and support children and young people with multi-sensory impairments and complex health care needs in their new Summer Holiday Club, from the 1st â€“ 19th August!
Read more here, and apply online here.
You will also need to attend an interview and complete a DBS check.
Call 020 7520 0999 for more information.
Good luck! All the best
